articles.title: Highlights - Racing 92 v Sale Sharks - Quarter-finals Heineken Champions Cup Rugby 2021/22 - Heineken Champions Cup & EPCR Challenge Cup
articles.description: The very best of European Rugby go head to head in the Heineken Champions Cup & the EPCR Challenge Cup 2021/22. Follow all the action live here, hit the bell...
